product_title: Samsung 50 Inch QE50QEF1AU Smart 4K UHD HDR QLED TV

description.main_text:
This is our one to watch. Experience true-to-life 4K detail and picture-perfect colour with this Quantum HDR TV from Samsung â€“ the World's best-selling TV brand. The QEF1 offers intelligent 4K upscaling and 100% colour volume with Real Quantum Dot and sound that tracks the on-screen action for a truly immersive audio-visual experience, whatever content you are watching. This Smart TV is powered by Tizen OS, so you can watch your favourite digital TV channels.

Samsung TV Plus provides instant access to thousands of TV shows and movies, and all for free. Just connect to the internet and watch live and on-demand entertainment, news, sports highlights, kids shows, and more - no strings attached. Now that really is smart!

Samsung Gaming Hub brings together the biggest console and streaming games from Xbox and others, straight to your Samsung TV. You don't need a console, and there are no downloads or storage limits - just turn on your TV and play. Game Pass and a compatible controller are required.

The Q4 AI Gen1 Processor in this Samsung TV takes care of the 4K detail and upscaling, whilst Quantum HDR dynamically optimises every single frame in real time, so you can enjoy greater depth and detail in every scene.

For a truly immersive viewing experience, you need great sound. As well as Object Tracking Sound Lite, this Samsung TV has Adaptive Sound technology to make sure you hear every detail.

The beautifully slim design of this TV blends into your decor, elevating your style without taking over.

Model number: QE50QEF1AU.

2025 model.

Dimensions and Weight

  • Screen size: 50 inches.
  • Size of TV H64.7, W112.03, D6cm.
  • Size of TV with stand: H69.4, W112.03, D23.7cm.
  • Width of TV stand 75.06cm.
  • Weight of TV without stand 9.6kg (unpackaged).
  • Weight of TV with stand 9.9kg.
  • Suitable for wall mounting 200 x 200 bracket.
  • Length of cable: 1.5m.
  • Packaged size H76.5, W125.5, D12.7cm.
  • Packaged weight 13.5kg.

Screen Technology

  • QLED TV Screen.
  • 4K Ultra HD display resolution.
  • Micro dimming technology improves the contrast by dimming individual sections of the TV screen.
  • HDR.
  • HDR10.
  • HDR 10+.
  • Motion rate 50Hz.
  • Resolution 3840 x 2160 pixels.

Sound Technology

  • 2 channel sound system.
  • 20 watt RMS power output.

Connectivity

  • 1 USB port and 3 HDMI sockets.
  • Built in Wi-Fi.
  • Ethernet connection.
  • Bluetooth.

Smart TV features

  • Voice control - works with Amazon Alexa, works with Google assistant, built in Bixby, .
  • Tizen operating system.
  • Compatible with the following smart apps: Now TV, Disney+, Netflix, iTVX, My5, All 4, Amazon Prime, YouTube.
  • Internet browser.
  • Miracast.

Additional features

  • Features USB recording and video playback.
  • DVB-T2CS2 digital tuner.
  • CI plus slot.
  • Sleep timer.
  • Parental controls.
  • Aerial required.

Energy efficiency information:

  • Energy efficiency class: G.
  • Energy consumption per 1000h: 69kWh.
  • Energy consumption in high dynamic mode per 1000h: 112kWh.
  • Annual power consumption 96kWh.
  • Standby power consumption 0.5 watt.

In the box

  • TV.
  • Remote control (requires 2 x AAA batteries, included).
  • Power cable.
  • TV stand.
  • Also in the box: User Manual.

General information:

  • Manufacturer's 1 year guarantee.
  • EAN: 8806097122074.
